skins.selfIntroduction: Listen up! I'm the noble, lucky, invincible, magni... magnici... the 8th ship of the Kagerou-class, Yukikaze the Great! What the heck... that word's so hard to pronounce... Ahem! Anyway, I shall be your lucky star from now on, so be grateful! Wa ha ha!
skins.acquisition: Hehehe~ As a reward for making it this far, the lucky Yukikaze the Great shall join you! You should feel honored!
skins.login: You've finally returned! Now, get to work for Yukikaze the Great!
skins.details: Feast your eyes upon the heroic majesty of Yukikaze the Great!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Wa ha ha! Yukikaze the Great is invincible!
skins.secretaryIdle2: If you beg me like that, I have no choice but to lend you my aid!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Eheh~ Hmph. Yukikaze the Great is only giving you the time of day because she's in a good mood!
skins.secretaryIdle4: Look at that face of yours~ It's only because of me, Yukikaze the Great!
skins.secretaryIdle5: You thought I wouldn't come over? Hmph! Unlike you, Yukikaze the Great is mature and would never do something so childish!
skins.secretaryTouch: Phew... that was scary... Huh? I didn't say anything!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: What are... you doing... nngh!? Go die!!
skins.secretaryHeadpat: Eep! That scared me... Huh? None of your business!

skins.shipDescription: This outfit is sooo cute~ ehehe... Ack!! *cough* *cough*! Ahem! From now on, you are the faithful companion of Yukikaze the Great! As such, you will not be permitted to leave my side, understood?
skins.acquisition: This outfit is sooo cute~ ehehe... Ack!! *cough* *cough*! Ahem! From now on, you are the faithful companion of Yukikaze the Great! As such, you will not be permitted to leave my side, understood?
skins.details: Commander, I want to rub against you every time I see you... Ehehe~ so comfy~?
skins.secretaryIdle1: As long as Yukikaze the Great is at your side, bad luck and whatnot shall be banished forever!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Spend as much time with Yukikaze the Great as you please! After all, you are the one who I have chosen!
skins.secretaryIdle3: For our next date, you shall take me to view the cherry blossoms~? (Ahh, I'm so glad I'll get to go on another date~ ehehe~)
skins.secretaryTouch: Ehehe~ Commander, your rub-rub feels so nice~?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: The Great and M-Mature Yukikaze h-has long been accustomed to these kinds of things! Ah.... ahhn...

skins.shipDescription: Wa ha ha! My "universal-as-long-as-there-is-a-ceiling" swing set is finally complete! Commander, are you jealous? Want to give it a try? Too~ bad~! This seat is reserved only for the noble and elegant Yukikaze!
skins.acquisition: Wa ha ha! My "universal-as-long-as-there-is-a-ceiling" swing set is finally complete! Commander, are you jealous? Want to give it a try? Too~ bad~! This seat is reserved only for the noble and elegant Yukikaze!
skins.login: Commander, good timing! I shall allow you to help push my swing!
skins.details: Even though this dress perfectly suits Yukikaze the Great, it makes it hard to play on the swings... Urgh... what should I do?!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Ahh, I can feel Commander's longing gazes... but alas! This swing set is for Yukikaze the Great, and no one else! Wa ha ha! Am I not downright evil?
skins.secretaryIdle2: My gothic dress? Heheh~ You might think I've gotten tired of hearing it, but... I shall allow you to praise the beauty of Yukikaze the Great! Haha!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Swinging around too much shakes around your brain and makes you stupid...? And the only way to fix it is to stay in one spot and work? Really?! Um, I suppose... it can't be helped then...
skins.secretaryTouch: Yes, yes! That's right, Commander, put your back into it! Wa ha haaaahh!! I'm flyingggg~!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Funyaaaagh! Th-that scared me half to death!! Dumb Commander, go die already!

skins.shipDescription: Wa ha ha~! Did your heart skip a beat from seeing the charming Yukikaze? Hmph... Well, looks like the Dragon Empery girls are setting off firecrackers... let's go join them! Here, make sure to hold on to my hand!
